00027 class DnsSdService : public CommonServiceValues
00028 {
00029 public:
00030     DnsSdService();
00031     DnsSdService( const DnsSdService& ToCopy );
00032     DnsSdService( const DnsSdService* ToCopy );
00033     DnsSdService( const SimpleString FullName, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString HostName = SimpleString::EmptyString );
00034     DnsSdService( const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString RegType, const SimpleString Domain, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString HostName = SimpleString::EmptyString );
00035     DnsSdService( const SimpleString ServiceName, const SimpleString Protocol, CommonServiceValues::TransportProtocol Transport, const SimpleString Domain, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString HostName = SimpleString::EmptyString );
00036
00037     // Virtual destructor always
00038     virtual ~DnsSdService();
00039
00040     SimpleString CompleteServiceName; //[ServiceNameLength];    // Complete service Name
00041     SimpleString RegisteredName;
00042     ServiceProperties Properties;
00043
00044     static bool CheckProtocol( const SimpleString RegisterType );
00045     static bool CheckName( const SimpleString Name );
00046
00047 protected:
00048     void Empty();
00049     void Init();
00050     void Init( const SimpleString eFullName, uint16_t ePort, const SimpleString eHostName = SimpleString::EmptyString );
00051
00052
00053 public:
00054     SimpleString Name;                        // Name of the service (63 bytes + '\0')
00055     SimpleString Protocol;                    // type of service (63 bytes + '\0')
00056     SimpleString Transport;                    // transport protocol ("tcp" or "_udp")
00057     TransportProtocol nTransport;                    // numerical value for transport protocol
00058     SimpleString Domain;                    //[kDNSServiceMaxDomainName];            // DNS domain name
00059
00060     uint16_t Port;                                    // On which port the service is running
00061     SimpleString HostName;                    // On which host the service is running
00062
00063     SimpleString ToString();                        // print a human readable description of service
00064 };
